STATIC_ABILITY.LOCALISED_TEXT: エンチャント（クリーチャー）
STATIC_ABILITY.CONTINUOUS_ACTION: local attach_filter = Object():AttachmentFilter_Get() attach_filter:Clear() attach_filter:AddCardType( CARD_TYPE_CREATURE )

TRIGGERED_ABILITY.LOCALISED_TEXT: When Fists of Ironwood enters the battlefield, put two 1/1 green Saproling creature tokens onto the battlefield.
Quand les Poings de ferbois arrivent sur le champ de bataille, mettez sur le champ de bataille deux jetons de créature 1/1 verte Saprobionte.
Cuando los Puños de maderacero entren al campo de batalla, pon en el campo de batalla dos fichas de criatura Saprolín verdes 1/1.
Wenn die Fäuste aus Eisenholz ins Spiel kommen, bringe zwei 1/1 grüne Saproling-Kreaturenspielsteine ins Spiel.
Quando i Pugni di Ferrobosco entrano nel campo di battaglia, metti sul campo di battaglia due pedine creatura Saprolingio 1/1 verdi.
鉄の樹の拳が戦場に出たとき、緑の１/１の苗木･クリーチャー・トークンを２体戦場に出す。
무쇠나무 주먹이 전장에 들어올 때, 1/1 녹색 묘목 생물 토큰 두 개를 전장에 놓는다.
Когда Кулаки Железного Дерева выходят на поле битвы, положите на поле битвы две фишки существа 1/1 зеленый Сапролинг.
Quando Punhos de Carvalho entrar no campo de batalha, coloque no campo de batalha duas fichas de criatura verdes 1/1 do tipo Saprófita.
TRIGGERED_ABILITY.RESOLUTION_TIME_ACTION: local token_count = 2 if token_count > 0 then MTG():PutTokensIntoPlay( "TOKEN_SAPROLING_1_1_277461", token_count, EffectController() ) end

STATIC_ABILITY.LOCALISED_TEXT: La créature enchantée a le piétinement.
La criatura encantada tiene la habilidad de arrollar.
エンチャントされているクリーチャーはトランプルを持つ。
STATIC_ABILITY.CONTINUOUS_ACTION: local parent = Object():GetParent() if parent ~= nil then parent:GetCurrentCharacteristics():Characteristic_Set( CHARACTERISTIC_TRAMPLE, 1 ) end

SPELL_ABILITY.TARGET_DEFINITION: local filter = Object():GetFilter() filter:Clear() filter:AddCardType( CARD_TYPE_CREATURE ) filter:SetZone( ZONE_IN_PLAY ) filter:SetHint( HINT_ALLIED, EffectController() )
SPELL_ABILITY.RESOLUTION_TIME_ACTION: local target_card = EffectDC():Get_Targets(0):Get_CardPtr(0) if target_card ~= nil then Object():Enchant( target_card ) end
